title: The proposal for construction of such structure should come as a proposal from the owner/owners/society/societies or federation of societies shall be meant for the beneficial use of the owner/owners/members of such society/societies/federation of societies
clause_text: The proposal for construction of such structure should come as a proposal from the owner/owners/society/societies or federation of societies shall be meant for the beneficial use of the owner/owners/members of such society/societies/federation of societies. Such structures shall not be used for any other purpose, except for recreational activities.
